text: Come one, come all! Step right up to the House of Illusions, where nightmares play and shadows dance!
But beware, traveler, the masks you wear here become your reality. Choose wisely, for some faces cannot be removed.
Laughter echoes in the darkness, but its source might chill your blood. Can you survive the games of this twisted carnival?
Escape before the clock strikes midnight, or join the eternal party as a porcelain puppet of the ringmaster.
